S0.name: Baseline
S0.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings (LCZ 5). Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Urban canyon aspect ratio 1. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation or water features.
S0.primaryAnalysisFocus: Establish reference for fluxes, environmental conditions, and comfort metrics.

S1_1.name: Tall Canyon
S1_1.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 30 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation.
S1_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of Urban Canyon Aspect Ratio, Sky View Factor (SVF), mutual shading, and wind flow on canyon climate.

S1_2.name: Wide Canyon
S1_2.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 30 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation.
S1_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of lower Urban Canyon Aspect Ratio, higher SVF, and increased solar access on surface heating.

S1_3.name: Staggered Layout
S1_3.description: Staggered grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation.
S1_3.primaryAnalysisFocus: Changes in wind channeling and ventilation in canyons, surface temperatures.

S1_4.name: Glass Buildings
S1_4.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Building façade material: glass; roof is concrete. Asphalt ground. No vegetation.
S1_4.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shortwave and longwave radiation, heat storage, surface temperatures.

S1_5.name: Green Façades
S1_5.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Building façade: green walls; roof is concrete. Asphalt ground. No vegetation.
S1_5.primaryAnalysisFocus: Cooling from evapotranspiration (Qₑ), surface temperatures, and longwave radiation.

S2_1.name: High Albedo Pavement
S2_1.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, ground surface: high-albedo pavement. No vegetation.
S2_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of albedo on surface temperature, radiation balance (Q*), and stored heat (ΔQₛ).

S2_2.name: Sandy Loam Ground
S2_2.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, ground surface: sandy loam soil. No vegetation.
S2_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of changing from impervious to pervious surface, allowing for cooling from evapotranspiration (Qₑ) and ground temperature distribution.

S3_1.name: Grass Cover
S3_1.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, ground cover: grass (height 25 cm).
S3_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Impact of a low, continuous vegetative cover on surface temperature and latent heat flux (Qₑ).

S3_2.name: Hedges
S3_2.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. Vegetation: hedges (height 1 m) along streets.
S3_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effects of low, dense vegetation on near-ground wind flow, shading, and local humidity.

S3_3.name: Deciduous Trees
S3_3.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. Vegetation: deciduous trees (height 6 m) along streets.
S3_3.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shading and evapotranspiration from tree canopies on canyon climate.

S3_4.name: Evergreen Trees
S3_4.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. Vegetation: evergreen trees (height 6 m) along streets.
S3_4.primaryAnalysisFocus: Effect of shading and evapotranspiration from tree canopies on canyon climate.

S4_1.name: Mist Nozzles
S4_1.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation. Water feature: active misting/spray system.
S4_1.primaryAnalysisFocus: Intensive, localized evaporative cooling; impact on air temperature and humidity.

S4_2.name: Water Reservoir
S4_2.description: Aligned grid of 4×4 buildings. Building height 16 m, street width 16 m. Concrete buildings, asphalt ground. No vegetation. Water feature: central water reservoir.
S4_2.primaryAnalysisFocus: Cooling from evaporation and the effect of water’s high thermal inertia.
